about_the_game:
Fujii is a meditative and magical journey through dreamlike landscapes filled with light and wonder.

An adorable gnome companion welcomes you home. It’s the beautiful garden of your dreams, ready to come to life through the mystical power that lies at your fingertips.



Rejuvenate your soul as you affectionately nurture bountiful seeds, solve gentle puzzles, and explore otherworldly biomes eager to surprise and delight you. Take a breath, allow yourself to forget the troubles of the real world, and bask in this serene and uplifting experience about caring and cultivating.

🌿 FEATURES 🌿

  • Explore three organic biomes filled with magic, enchanted flowers, and beautiful plants
  • Nurture your own unique garden by collecting seeds to harvest colorful landscapes
  • Introduce gentle critters to your garden and solve puzzles with your adorable gnome companion by your side
  • Embark on a peaceful and whimsical adventure set to a meditative soundscape composed by French artist and composer Norman Bambi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 4GB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“It seems like there’s a sounds, visuals, and haptics to everything you do, and it really helps make the world feel real and responsive around you. I can’t think of another game in VR that does this quite as well and as consistently as Fujii.”
8/10 – Ben Lang, Executive Editor - Road to VR

“Fujii is a flower-filled garden of surprises that showcases everything wonderful about VR in a single experience.”
Bryan Taylor, Contributing Writer - BigBossBattle (B3)
short_description: Explore a colorful and magical world, lovingly nurture seeds, and introduce gentle critters to the verdant landscape you’ll manifest with your very own hands. A meditative and rejuvenating VR adventure in which you cultivate the garden of your dreams.
